---
title: Remove Favorite App
category: APP
order: 9
---

Remove an app from favorite app list.

###### POST /apps/:id/unfavorite

```
// cURL Example
curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..g_sED63nqS_cf68FKh8Ow1-0B4Ew_ojYS76P52hhqcF-gjImI93vM7Q4PI0t8i4ddiePD9vT470pD3obtzpo7eHD1ECfDuQkxqJqvN8elRYLWPYHjzElu0JqHDDIXh1TCtzGLReR4ZmC9g9DkhxDhocP9srWdVDAU_FbJOjznOE" "https://api.mixin.one/apps/06aed1e3-bd77-4a59-991a-5bb5ae6fbb09/unfavorite"
```

```
// Sample Response
{}
```
